thread.title: Banks given 15 days to disburse loan to sugar mills
thread.title_full: Banks given 15 days to disburse loan to sugar mills

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Banks given 15 days to disburse loan to sugar mills
text:
New Delhi
The government has given 15 more days to banks for disbursing Rs 1,900-crore soft loans to sugar mills to help them clear cane arrears to farmers that total over Rs 12,000 crore. PTI New Delhi
NSE to launch self-trade prevention mechanism To check self-trade, National Stock Exchange (NSE) plans to introduce a new facility in the capital market segment from October 12. It will prevent matching between a buy and a sell order entered in the same order book by a member for the same client code originating from same or different trading terminals. PTI New Delhi
BSE, NSE to move 25 firms to restricted trade segment The Bombay Stock Exchange and National Stock Exchange will next week shift a total of 25 companies to the restricted trading segment to ensure safety of investors in the capital markets. PTI
